streamdeck.header: A Stream Deck™ plugin allows you to control some Twitchat features with the push of a button

connect_form.title: Credentials
connect_form.ip_security:
Due to web browsers security, if you set an IP other than "127.0.0.1" or "localhost" the connection must be secured.
If you want to connect to a remote desktop you must use an https tunnel (like Ngrok).
Come ask for help on {LINK} if you don't know how to do that.

If your Stream Deck is on this computer, set 127.0.0.1 as IP.
